casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Juan Carlos BENITEZ. No. 24PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Anne M. Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Benitez, Juan Carlos. Staples S. Hughes, Appellate Defender, for State of North Carolina. Amy Kunstling Irene, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Vernon K. Stewart, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of September 2015 by State of NC to Strike Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
